< IXinxPluginConfigurationPage * > 		createSettingsDialog (QWidget *parent)=0
 Create a widget used in a wrapper for the configuration dialog box.

Detailed Description

This class is used to propose to the user modify their options. If the Plugins inherits from this interface the custom dialog show pages.

The Plugin create a wigdet contains the user interface, and have two method for put and get the configuration in the dialog.

Xinx integrate the widget in the configuration dialog.
